Detailed Description

A XinxPluginElement is a plugin (a library, PluginElement can be a script :). It's used with PluginSelector.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

XinxPluginElement::XinxPluginElement ( QObject *  plugin,
bool  isStatic = false 
)

Create an object based on a plugin. If the plugin isStatic isModifiable() will return false and isActivated() will return true.

Member Function Documentation

QString XinxPluginElement::description (  )  const [virtual]

Return the description of the plugin

Implements PluginElement.

bool XinxPluginElement::isConfigurable (  )  const [virtual]

Return always false even if the plugin inherits from IXinxPluginConfiguration. This hide the configuration button. Now the plugin have it's pages in the configuration dialog.

Implements PluginElement.

bool XinxPluginElement::isModifiable (  )  const [virtual]

Return true if the plugin is modifiable (no static)

Implements PluginElement.

Return true if the plugin is static
